attributes.additional_details: We the undersigned ask the UK government to recognize as genocide the crimes committed by the Greek Cypriot Government on 21-31 December 1963 also crimes against humanity in 1964/1974, where there was a plan drawn up by the government of Cyprus called the Akritas Plan which detailed how to exterminate the Turkish Cypriot population and declare Enosis (union with Greece) Turkish Cypriots were slaughtered and thrown into mass graves and were forcibly removed from their posts in the Cyprus Government.
